description: This app is capable of writing and highlight PDFs that do not have real text but are scans of pages. Excellent for studying.
summary: great for writing, drawing and viewing PDFs

description: Really nice! I'm very thankful to those involved in developing this software.

I have been using this app for more than 2 years and works just fine with my wacom tablet. 

But I just realised that when I use the full screen the pointer just dissappears , at least the one with the tablet and stylus but the mouse's works just fine.
You can edit, sign, insert images etc into PDF files with this application, you just need to export as PDF to save it. Nothing else that runs natively on Linux even comes close.
Massive good improvement, but can't access printer (Flatpak)
summary: Massive improvement, but can't access printer (Flatpak)

description:
1. pointer isn't visible when highlighter is selected
2. Cannot access Latex
summary: Very good work! Couple of small things to fix

description: very fast. Comes up as an Open With option on PDFs
It's very simple yet complete, and it's also very intuitive. I'm using it with a Wacom One tablet, and it just keeps getting better and better.
summary: The best note taking app for Linux

description: You can notice this was created by an actual user of handwriting apps, the space tool, the well delimited writing area ... It's just what you need to take notes, do homework, etc. Thanks!
summary: Great linux alt. to OneNote, I actually consider this a better app

description: Lets me edit PDFs. Perfect!
It is important that Linux is able to offer alternatives to Mac tools. I was able to write text but it has repeatedly frozen on me running KDE Neon 19.4 and I had to escape the program.
Seems to work quite well for hand written notes on my wacom enabled laptop. Just enough features to be useful, not enough to feel bloated.

its nice you can open file - work on them & and save it as pdf 
thanks
Ubuntu 18.04, when grabbing the eraser it is invisible on page. It works but I cannot control it because I cannot see where it is.
Straight to the point, and easy to use. Xournal++ made it easy to transition all my school notes into something digital.

A great app for note-taking, whether you're mouse-driven or pen/tablet-enabled. Allows you to set multiple paper types (lined/graph/graph-with-border, etc.), mark up PDFs with highlights, and mix hand-written and typed notes (even with inserted images).

(As a pro-tip: Enable the new [experimental] input system for a better writing experience!)
summary: Does what it says on the tin

description: I enjoy using this app during covid-19. Very useful. I would recommened this to my friend too. But, one thing is those randomly crashed(rarely occur), if they'r fixed, this could be perfect.
This works great on my touch screen laptop, particular with the stylus for taking notes and drawing!
fffffffffffffffffffffffffffffff
great tool for drawing on PDF files.

Xournal++ works really well for completing homework assignments.
I can't wait for v1.1.0 to be released; I have a touchscreen device and v1.1.0 makes touchscreen drawing much easier. For now, I'm building from source.

I am really happy with all the features this app offers and I can easily say that it is almost feature complete.

Missing features:
- Better PDF handling (text selection, pop-up notes, annotation search...)
- Better document handling (merging and rearranging multiple documents, page templates and settings which are document relative)
summary: This is the best handwriting app on Linux

description: Have this app and Wacom tablet while work from home, can really replace my android/IOS tablet.

Tested on Fedora 34. Pressure sensitivity works. Eraser (backside of stylus) works properly, even a button on the stylus (seen as "stylus button 2"). Top button does not seem to be respected but still a great app for taking handwritten notes on Linux.
Also, export to SVG is a great feature!

// EDIT
It is now also my go-to PDF editor for simple edits
summary: Works great with Surface Pen on HP

description:
WOW! I'm really surprised about Xournal++
I tried it a year ago because I've got a convertible Laptop. I wasn't really impressed as the Windows alternatives were more superior with more features.
I tried it again now and am positively surprised how well it performs.
Scrolling and zooming a pdf document with your fingers on a touchscreen works perfect, my pen works and I can choose different colors and sizes, it's really simple to add text fields to the document. I couldn't be happier!
A big thank you to all the Authors who worked and still work in this project!
I'm thankful for those involved in the development of this software.
Between this and Joplin, it's a golden age time to be taking notes on a computer.
Actively being developed. Fill in bug reports at github.
There is none other like it. Impressive App.

Xournal++ is absolutely awesome in a number of ways. First, it's a great PDF viewer. But you can also easily edit PDFs and export them! It's a very easy way to digitally sign a form, or even edit forms that don't have PDF form controls built in.

Second, it works flawlessly with my Wacom tablet. It's very natural once you get used to it, and I find it handy to be able to annotate and highlight documents on the fly.

Third, it's completely free and open source! What's not to love? Oh, and it has plugins with Lua. Lua rocks!

AS ALREADY STATED BY OTHER USERS, THIS IS A WORK TOOL KIT WITH DOZENS OF USES.

IT SHOWS WHAT CAN BE DONE IN LINUX AND FOR
LINUX. AND, THE QUESTION IS - WHY IS LINUX FULL
OF SO MANY BADLY DESIGNED APPLICATIONS?
I'm a new user of this app, but it was really easy to use and it has a lot of options for handwriting
summary: Great App, a lot of options for handwriting. Recommended

description: Seamless and fully featured
nice app. appreaciate the developers
Muy buena la aplicaciòn, no tiene nada que envidiar a onenote (Amazing App), But I would suggest to include a ruler tool
summary: Great app, increible aplicaciòn y muy completa

description: I've been looking for an alternative to Onenote with a pen for a long time. They've done a great job. In my opinion, when compared to using a pen, neither OneNote nor Evernote can compete with this one. Moreover, it is Open Source and free.
Works perfectly well on my 2-in-1 laptop. It's very customisable and easy to use. I just wish it had folders and subfolders for notes in the app, that would make it amazing.
I use xournal++ to take notes pretty much every day. It took a bit of configuration to get everything as I wanted but I've had almost no issues.
It's app I've been looking for. It's all simple and clean note making app.

Such an incredibly useful app, I literally would not have passed so many of my courses without it. The ability to edit PDFs and the tools available in taking notes and annotating documents on my 2-in-1 laptop have been indespensible for my workflow.
summary: The best handwritten note application for Linux I've found

description: Great app to write over PDFs. Thank you!
simple and efficient

Not only does it works with my Wacom in Linux UBUTU, but does so fluidly.

 I grade submitted labs as PDFs, and return them as such. When I write onto the pad INSTANTLY it appears on the screen. Other apps have a delay when I write on the screen and for some reason it makes my hand writing look sloppy. 

This app follows my pen motion very fast and my hand writing looks natural and good.

You guys did a great job, thanks!

exactliy the thing i was searching, taking notes on pdfs, but also write and draw on an empty document, import images and draw shapes and arrows. amazing. only thing that is not as easy to do is rotate a single page.
works great for my writing tablet from amazon
I needed something like this thank you

I expected to find an alternative to my Windows note taking software. However, this is WAY BETTER. And it's free and open source! This is simultaneously simpler than other applications and more useful and powerful. Now when I send PDFs to people with my notes, they'll actually look good.
Small, quick and amazing!
This is really great. You can use it to sign pdf files. I use it to make many annotations on pdf files. It works much much better than Libreoffice Draw.
Works well. I hope it will get even better! The developers seem to have long term plans

I have been using Xournal++ since the beginning of 2023 and I have never had any problems with the application, without a doubt great for studying and writing notes. The best part is that it's very customizable.
Way more stable than OneNote. The program loads large PDFs slow, but it's still useable. It supports my Wacom Intuos tablet very well.
Its great, thank you!

Cannot use the text tool. The only way I can use it is by press and holding a key for a couple of seconds, but even then it will put down multiple letters, making it impossible to use for legible text.
But adding 2D and 3D geometric shapes and plotting simple functions would be awesome for teaching.
The best app for digital notetaking I know to use with tablet and pen. It's also a great tool to tweak and edit PDF files...for free.
Useful and fun.
Finally something that lets you draw on pdf
Great app - perfect for writing on pdfs (which helps with completing assignments entirely on computer)
Help me a lot on college
summary: Great app do edit pdf's and take notes

description: This lets me write handwritten notes and annotate/edit pdfs. What more can I ask for!
I want dark mode, please, is all I want, this app is perfect.
Having to use windows suxx
works as expected
Its a good combo with a wacom table
Only app I found that supports drawing (with tablet) on PDF
Coming from PDF Annotator (Windows) this is the perfect replacement!
Great tool for annotating PDF files.
Works great for taking notes, using as scratch paper, and annotating pdf's.

Great work continue developing it. 
Thanks
summary: One and only many many thanks to the developer

description: Microsoft OneNote best replacement. Absolutely recommended!

Though there are sometimes issues with the pen tool, I think that's down to my device and not the app itself. I need to edit PDFs a lot for my schoolwork, and Xournal++ is by far the best application I have found for that thus far.

I'm giving three stars for the benefit of the Xournal++ developers since, being
on an Ubuntu 20.04 Surface Go, the support might be wacky through no fault of
their own, but rather it might be caused by lower lever components.

However, for my experience at least, the application has been pretty much a
nightmare. I did give it a fair run in these weeks, but it was just too much
to bear.

On X.org, it is plastered with bugs. On Wayland, it is barely usable.

What do you mean I can't scroll? Oh, yes, I can! No... I can't. Oh, for God's
sake, make up your mind! No, I'm zooming out. Please, let me zoom out. I guess
we won't be zooming out today.

It lets me open PDF, but it won't let me save the PDF I opened. Okay. 

Finally, I exported the PDF. Wait, what? Why are some t's and i's missing?
I'm pretty sure I'm not having strokes at the age of 20 and can write full
words alright.

Can we talk about how bad the UI looks? This is supposed to be a modern 
application. Don't give me the excuse that 'it's GTK,' because Evince,
Nautilus, and Epiphany to name a few, do look sleek and polished. Just don't
fill it with toolbars like we're back in the 90s. I'm on 10-inch screen with 
200% scaling. (That's because, on Wayland, fractional scaling isn't supported.)
I want to see content, not huge toolbars all over the place.

This is all the tool I need. It shouldn't surprise but government issued PDF forms aren't created to be be fillable and I have several to fill. Thank you for this elegantly simple tool for a common need.
I love the software and am very thankful to the developers for this. Linux is starved for software like these. Thank you!

Decent annotation features
Allows you to delete entire strokes
Allows you to annotate PDFs (brilliant!)
Allows text annotations
Has all the features I need
Haven't used for long but doesn't seem glitchy yet
Keep up the good work!

I've transitioned from windows to Linux, and my only fear was that I would't be able to take handwritten notes on my 2 in 1 laptop, but this app has me covered. I would say it is even better than OneNote is some regards. I would like to see cloud sync, and a mobile app, though.

When trying to add a LaTeX formula, I got:

Could not find LaTeX package 'standalone'. Please install standalone (found in texlive-latex-extra) and make sure it's accessible by your LaTeX installation).

See:
https://tex.stackexchange.com/q/564936/166831
The entire interface is unknown Unicode boxes. This should not be the case.
Crashed halfway through my lecture and lost 30 minutes of notes. Sorry
Really Excellent .Loved it

imo some tools could have more features, e.g. triangles, different coordinate systems and so on! also the possibility to safe your pens, such that you could shortcut to colors+tip sizes.

The best and unique feature is the annotation of pdf-documents! xournalpp is out of league the best app on linux there. 
What could be added: the text marker wich marks just the hole line/section. 
Drawboard PDF on Win10 has got such features which would be helpful here too, as I hate windows and love linux ;)
summary: Works very fine, my writing looks better than in other Apps

description: Snap install, open PDF, sign and date. Super simple. Well done.
I am lucky to come accross such a handy software. Drawing a smooth curve would be of great improvement. Thanks for the excellent job.
Very helpful application. One of apps I cannot without. Thanks a lot for developer!
summary: Awasome! Use this on daily basis

description: Awesome application to use for online classes.
summary: A good application for Teachers Online

description: unlike xournal it saves the configurations when you close the app
overall fantastic; text recognition feature could be added
functions more than any note taking app you get in windows
Note taking with a pen is smooth and works as expected. Very nice !
You can use this application as a simulated "lightboard" combined with OBS studio.
very good..just grab any sylus and use it if you are teaching onlinr
summary: Good for online teaching; works as whiteboard

description: That being put out of the way, it is a decent program to write notes on. Not comparable to Onenote, but if you are using Linux you should be used to such shortcomings.
summary: There is no need for this to be a snap

description: Quite customisable, never crashes, a dark theme would be a bonus, but a great app.
summary: Great option for a note-taking application

description: Unable to scroll down the page
summary: Unable to scroll down the page

description: in Xournal++ i can't hide my cursor when i write with stylus, but when using Xournal app it will disappear.
summary: it was great but i had some issues :(

description: The last version has a problem with the pointer! It is very tiny. When I start to write with the digital pen, the pointer is tiny and it is diificult to localize in the screen.
summary: The last version has a problem with the pointer! It is very tiny

description: I'm getting too much lagging after updating to the latest version. Please fix it.

In times of Corona this program proves to be the backbone of education over the internet. It enables to write with a pen on the touchscreen of my computer, even under Linux. Since it runs on any OS every student can use it on his/her computer. Indispensable is the capability to annotate pdf-files and to export annotated files as pdf again.

Some minor deficiencies exist, however: font and fontsize have to be adjusted with every program start and making the LaTeX support work for math formulars is so tedious, that I still was not successful in enabling it.
It's probably by far the best tool for writing notes with a stylus, at least under Linux.

Perfekt für ALLE die in PDFs reinschreiben müssen!
besonders für:
Lehrerkräfte
Schüler*innen
Studierende
Vielen Dank für die Entwicklung!
It works really well with a stylus, the only feature I'm really missing is that text does not automatically wrap at the end of the page. Also a UI update to GTK4 would be incredible!
summary: Works really well with a stylus

description: Erfüllt voll meine Wünsche: Ein einfach zu bedienendes Programm zu bearbeiten von Bildern, pdf Dateien und zum Notizen machen
summary: Perfekt zum bearbeiten von pdf Dateien

description: Ich kann meine pdf Anmerkungen schreiben und hierfür meinen Lenovo Pen 2 nutzen. Die App bietet so viel mehr ich freue mich auf das entdecken. Es geht kaum besser. Vielen Dank.
many options avaiable.
Ich benutze die kleine App zum Ausfüllen / Ergänzen von PDF Dokumenten, die nicht als Formular gestaltet wurden. Funktioniert wunderbar !
Easy to use, very polished

Endlich kann ich mein Wacom Sinnvoll nutzen ohne erst das Schreibgerät suchen zu müssen. Dokument laden und einfach schreiben ist eine Wohltat.
Dafür gibt es von mir ganz seltene 5 Sterne
Ich benutze eigentlich GoodNotes in IOS, allerdings bietet IOS zu wenig unterstützung für Terminals usw. weshalb am Laptop auf Debian arbeite. Xournal eignet sich als Alternative sehr gut!
summary: Super Alternative zu GoodNotes auf IOS

description: Seit ich ein Laptop mit Touchscreen und Stifteingabe habe, habe ich viele Apps dieser Art ausprobiert. Dies ist bislang das Beste. Es hat einfach alle sinnvollen Funktionen und keinen Schnickschnack, keine Werbung, keine penetranten in App Käufe. Ich benutze es häufig um Skizzen für unsere technischen Zeichner anzufertigen oder um handschriftlich Änderungen in Pläne einzutragen, auch auf der Baustelle.

Very nice program. I use it for school for a little over a month now and it has most of the things i need (a protractor would be nice, there is a discussion on github already).
Apt version supports different languages and math tex format.

all you need for use as notepad (images, shapes, wacom-integration); works on top of existing pdfs (to, for example, sign them); can be FLAWLESSLY used in dockerized environment (useful for the classic non-sudo enterprise dev) via X11-Forwarding
summary: great program, all i need of a notepad

description: Works great =)

Ich war leider zu lange auf Windows gefangen da ich keine Alternative zu OneNote finden konnte.
Xournal sah auf den ersten Blick vielversprechend aus.
Nachdem ich die ein oder andere Einstellung angepasst habe kann ich fast wie gewohnt meine Übungsblätter bearbeiten.
Jetzt bin ich endlich von Windows weg und vollzeit Linux Benutze.
Muy buena aplicación, más con ésta situación. Lo único que le falta para que sea perfecta sería el auto completar al escribir en LaTex. Todo lo otro es genial.
Ahora en clases virtuales es muy útil y tiene todo lo necesario.
La uso con una tableta Huion y es excelente. Las anotaciones quedan bien, y los pdf se pueden señalar sin problema.

Great app, but still needs some brushups, it crashes sometimes, but they made last session recovery. so not a big problem. Also stroke recognition doesn't work well with circles and rectangles, neither triangles.
Also would like to suggest to improve highlighter functionality
Bastante versatil
Muy buena App de software libre para anotar pdf. Lo único que no me abre son las imáganes de un archivo pdf. No sucede lo mismo en todos. Sólo con algunos.
Tiene modo oscuro y más funciones, muy buena

Funciona genial en la pantalla táctil de mi portátil. No sólo la utilizo como pizarra virtual en clases on-line, sino que también me sirve para abrir PDFs con exámenes escaneados y realizar las correcciones. Además, en Linux he tenido problemas para incluir textos en los PDFs y con esta aplicación puedo abrirlos, incluir el texto y exportar todo de nuevo a PDF.
Maravillosa.
summary: Estupenda para mi portatil con pantalla táctil

description: Algunas aplicaciones reconocen texto y puede editarse, sin embargo se pierde el aspecto original del documento. Esta es ideal si se precisa que todo quede igual salvo algún agregado o cambio menor (una o pocas letras o palabras)
summary: Muy buena para anotaciones y ediciones sencillas de pdf

description: Doy Clases con este software, me funciona muy bien. Recomendado
La aplicación es buenísima, pero cuando actualicé a ubuntu 20.04 empezó a congelar mi equipo. Ojalá u hagan algo para mejorar este problema.

Úsala para escribir o subrayar un pdf. Es diferente a otras aplicaciones si vienes de trabajar con tablet, pero es muy útil en trabajos académicos. Para subrayar, te recomiendo que selecciones el rotulador y una línea, no lo hagas a mano alzada con el ratón. Muy recomendable, uso estable bajo Kubuntu 20.04
Muy util para dar clases y anotar PDFs
Perfecta para dar clases, tomar notas, anotar pdfs, imágenes y muchas cosas más.
Excelente para trabajar en clases virtuales

Versión actualizada del Xournal de siempre. Funciona bien.
En particular valoro que aquí sí se pueden buscar textos dentro del pdf.

Nota: Al hacer la instalación aparece Iniciar - Desinstalar - Permisos 
Hay que entrar en Permisos y activar que pueda leer y escribir en unidades externas.
He probado varias y, para Linux, esta herramienta satisface todas mis necesidades. Velocidad de respuesta y sensación de escritura natural.
summary: La herramienta más completa para usar una tableta digital

description: es buena pero no he logrado que me deje usar las fórmulas y eso me molesta, siempre me dice que el archivo clobal no lo permite y aunque he revisado la configuración, no me deja
summary: es buena pero no puedo usar la opción de fórmulas, no me lo permite

description:
this app save my day with such really bad wacom 13. 
Wacom does not contain any software. It all depends on your computer.
Finally wacom is just an additional screen. Burk...

Xournal++ permet d'éditer des fichiers PDF de manière pratique et simple. Cette application me fait gagner un temps (et un papier!) précieux dans bien des démarches administratives. Xournal++ fait partie de mes outils bureautiques favoris et indispensables.

I use this to paste images into pdfs, which is just one of its many uses. But take care to 'Export as a pdf' afterwards because the native file format is not widely used.

Colourful, intuitive and useful.
summary: Great for pasting images into pdfs

description:
Xournal++ est une application possédant de grandes qualités et permettant de faire simplement et rapidement des choses pas toujours facile avec d'autres logiciels.
- Dessin et écritute à main levée ou avec le clavier et la souris.
-ouverture et modification de pdf avec un enregisgrement permettant la modification ou export en pdf.
Excellent companion dans l'utilisation en classe pour remplacer les logiciels des vidéos-projecteurs interactifs (Epson par exemple)
n'ouvre pas les pdf faute de droits... ???
Ce logiciel permet de remplir un formulaire PDF sans l'imprimer. On peut saisir du texte, mais aussi tracer des lignes (rayer la mention inutile) ou des formes libres (signature).
summary: Très pratique pour remplir un formulaire PDF

description: Нужно было простое приложение для записи идей, замена обычной тетради. Приложение работает плавно, имеет приятный дизайн. Так же у приложения (как я понимаю) добавили новую иконку, которая выглядит намного современнее предыдущей.
Прекрасное приложение, если бы знал о его существовании ранее, то уже давно бы пользовался. Очень удобно делать записи, либо для презентации делать наброски в реальном времени.
Удобно делать пометки и ставить подписи в PDF документах
summary: Классный аналог PDF Expert для Mac OS

description: Использую его как инструмент для работы с интерактивной доской. Очень удобно.
在linux上在也没有什么软件像xournal++一样，具有丰富功能和抗衡goodnotes和onenote的能力了
summary: linux 上最好用的记笔记软件

description: 我这里用了一段时间之后没办法更改屏幕缩放大小，删除重装了也没解决问题因为配置文件我不会删掉。如果没有这个bug他会是一个很棒的软件。
summary: 在我这有bug不知道怎么解决
